item.title: Disposable 3 ply mask
item.description: 20 × 25 × 25gsm, 17.5 × 9.5cm, blue color. BFE>=95% Ce certificate, EN 149. Packing: 50pcs/box, 2000pcs/ctn Suitable for daily respiration protection that keeps out dust and breath particles.

item.title: KN95 Face Mask
item.description: Product Name KN95 face mask Model & Specs Folding face mask (N9) 105mm × 168mm CE Certificate STA20200313006EC Product Performance Suitable for respiratory protection, filtering dust, haze, bacteria, droplets and other harmful particles in the air.

item.title: Latex Glove
item.description: Special Features Non-beaded cuff design covers the extra area of forearm and prevents roll-down. Made from selected natural latex rubber.

item.title: Nitrile Glove
item.description: 0.1mm Nitrle Glove 100pcs/box, 10boxes/CTN Suitable for general protection.

item.title: Protective Suite with shoe cover
item.description: Disposable Coverall for Medical Use, 65gsm SMMS material+tape, white color, with hood, without boot, elastic cuff, zipper front closure with flap

item.title: Protective Suite without cover
item.description: Product features EO disinfection treatment, prevent liquid splash, good air permeability, comfort, antistatic; Durable, tear and wear resistant, comfortable, soft, light, breathable, no fuzz, anti-pollution, anti-static; Can permeate air and water vapor, but can exclude water-based liquids and aerosols; Made of high-quality non-woven materials, free of fillers, adhesives and silicon; The smooth surface repels inorganic liquid, prevents chemical substances from sputtering, and makes solid dust not easy to adhere; Special coating treatment, 100% dustproof performance can effectively prevent harmful ultra-fine dust, high concentration of inorganic acid, alkali and salt solution; Penetration tests of blood and derived viruses have shown that the invasion of body fluids, blood and haematopoietic pathogens can be prevented.
